description: The mandatory first action for any new task, ensuring a formal start to the Finite Development Cycle (FDC).

rules.description: Upon receiving a new task, the agent's first action MUST be to programmatically execute the FDC 'start' command to formally initiate the task and run the AORP orientation cascade.
rules.enforcement: This is a hard-coded behavior in the agent's core operational loop and is verified by the FDC toolchain.
